effect.sun_moon: Restores 1/16 of the user’s max HP at the end of each turn. If the user leaves the field, this effect ends. This effect is passed on by baton pass.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Restores 1/16 of the user’s max HP at the end of each turn. If the user leaves the field, this effect ends. This effect is passed on by baton pass.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Restores 1/16 of the user’s max HP at the end of each turn. If the user leaves the field, this effect ends. This effect is passed on by baton pass.

short_effect.sun_moon: Restores 1/16 of the user’s max HP each turn.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Restores 1/16 of the user’s max HP each turn.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Restores 1/16 of the user’s max HP each turn.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user envelops itself in a veil made of water. It regains some HP every turn.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user envelops itself in a veil made of water. It regains some HP every turn.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user envelops itself in a veil made of water. It regains some HP every turn.
